mapper.sql: select a.id, a."name", a."type", a.label, a.description, a.priority, a.flags, a."state", a.creation, a.lastmod, a."version", a.props, a.parent, parent.id parent_id, parent."name" parent_name, parent."type" parent_type, parent.label parent_label, parent.description parent_description, parent.priority parent_priority, parent.flags parent_flags, parent."state" parent_state, parent.creation parent_creation, parent.lastmod parent_lastmod, parent."version" parent_version, parent.props parent_props, parent.parent parent_parent, "type".id type_id, "type"."name" type_name, "type".label type_label, "type".description type_description, "type".priority type_priority, "type".flags type_flags, "type"."state" type_state, "type".creation type_creation, "type".lastmod type_lastmod, "type"."version" type_version, "type".props type_props, "type".dummy type_dummy from group a left join "group" parent on a.parent = parent.id left join grouptype "type" on a."type" = "type".id

select a.id, a."name", a."type", a.label, a.description, a.priority, a.flags, a."state", a.creation, a.lastmod, a."version", a.props, a.parent, parent.id parent_id, parent."name" parent_name, parent."type" parent_type, parent.label parent_label, parent.description parent_description, parent.priority parent_priority, parent.flags parent_flags, parent."state" parent_state, parent.creation parent_creation, parent.lastmod parent_lastmod, parent."version" parent_version, parent.props parent_props, parent.parent parent_parent, "type".id type_id, "type"."name" type_name, "type".label type_label, "type".description type_description, "type".priority type_priority, "type".flags type_flags, "type"."state" type_state, "type".creation type_creation, "type".lastmod type_lastmod, "type"."version" type_version, "type".props type_props, "type".dummy type_dummy from group a left join "group" parent on a.parent = parent.id left join grouptype "type" on a."type" = "type".id

where.select:
select g.* from group_user x left join "group" g on x."group" = g.id
x."user" = #{id}
where.insert: insert into group( "name", "type", label, description, priority, flags, "state", creation, lastmod, "version", props, parent ) values( #{name}, #{typeId}, #{label}, #{description}, #{priority}, #{flags}, #{state}, #{creationDate}, #{lastModifiedDate}, #{version}, #{properties.jsonStr}::jsonb, #{parentId} );
where.update: alter table lily.article add constraint article_gid_fkey foreign key (gid) references lily."group" (id) on update cascade on delete set null ; alter table lily.article_backref add constraint article_backref_gid_fkey foreign key (gid) references lily."group" (id) on update cascade on delete set null ;
